name: Bury Idle
description:
(12/4/23) Bury Idle Version 1.0.1 Mine ores and reach deeper in the mine. Features: -Over 26 Different Ores -Over 18 Different Pickaxes -Over 100 Different Perks/Tree Upgrades -Prestige System Please Report any bugs or suggestion

game created for Clicker Jam Spring 2023

Note that in order to see the theme of the jam in the game(Another Direction) you must play for a few hours.
